description:
## Summary
Payment service is returning 503 Service Unavailable errors for approximately 15% of requests.

## Impact
- Customers unable to complete purchases
- Estimated revenue impact: $50k/hour
- Affecting all regions

## Timeline
- 14:00 UTC - First alerts triggered
- 14:05 UTC - On-call paged
- 14:15 UTC - Identified memory pressure on payment-api pods
- 14:20 UTC - Scaled up replica count from 3 to 6
- 14:25 UTC - Error rate dropping
- 14:30 UTC - Fully recovered

## Root Cause
Memory leak in payment validation library v2.3.1 introduced in yesterday's deploy.

comments.author: oncall@company.com
comments.body: Seeing OOMKilled events on payment-api pods. Investigating.

comments.author: oncall@company.com
comments.body: Memory usage growing linearly over time. Looks like a leak. Scaling up as temporary fix.

comments.author: payments-team@company.com
comments.body: Confirmed leak in validation lib. Rolling back to v2.3.0.
